SELECT Fusion_pair AS fusion_pair , 5Gene_Junction AS gene5Junc , 3Gene_Junction AS gene3Junc , Breakpoint_Type AS breakpoint_type , Cancertype AS cancertype, BarcodeID AS barcodeID , IF(Frame = "NA","",Frame) AS frame , Chr_info AS chr_info , Source AS source, ChimerKB AS chimerKB, ChimerPub AS chimerPub, CONCAT(ChimerKB, "_", ChimerPub) AS supported , a.T_gene AS t_gene, a.H_gene AS h_gene , a.id , a.T_gene AS t_gene , a.H_gene AS h_gene , a.Exon_breakpoint AS exon_breakpoint FROM ChimerDB3.ChimerSeq_ver7 a, ChimerDB3.ChimerSeq_ver7_Fulltext b WHERE a.id=b.id
AND (H_gene = #{byGeneTxt} OR T_gene = #{byGeneTxt})
AND H_gene = #{byGeneTxt}
AND T_gene = #{byGeneTxt}
AND Fusion_pair = #{byGenePairTxt}
AND (H_locus LIKE CONCAT(#{byChrLocusTxt}, '%') OR T_locus LIKE CONCAT(#{byChrLocusTxt}, '%'))
AND Disease LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{byDiseaseTxt}), '%')
AND Cancertype IN
#{cancer}
OR (Source = 'FusionScan' AND Seed_reads_num >= ${noOfSeedReads})
OR (Source = 'TopHat-Fusion' AND Spanning_pairs_num >= ${noOfSpaningPairs})
OR (Source = 'PRADA' AND Junction_reads_num >= ${noOfJunctionReads})
OR (Source = 'ChiTaRs')
OR (Source = 'ChimerDB2_SRA')
OR Kinase != 0
OR Oncogene != 0
OR Tumor_suppressor != 0
OR Receptor != 0
OR Transcription_Factor != 0
AND Chr_info IN ('Intra-chr', 'Inter-chr')
AND Chr_info = 'Inter-chr'
AND Chr_info = 'Intra-chr'
AND (ChimerKB != 0 OR ChimerPub != 0)
AND ChimerKB != 0 AND ChimerPub != 0
AND MATCH(b.all_columns) AGAINST( CONCAT(#{searchKeyword}, '*') IN BOOLEAN MODE)
ORDER BY ${sortKey + 1} ${sortOrderDir}
LIMIT ${start}, ${length}

SELECT DISTINCT COUNT( * ) AS allNum FROM ChimerDB3.ChimerSeq_ver7 a, ChimerDB3.ChimerSeq_ver7_Fulltext b WHERE a.id=b.id
AND (H_gene = #{byGeneTxt} OR T_gene = #{byGeneTxt})
AND H_gene = #{byGeneTxt}
AND T_gene = #{byGeneTxt}
AND Fusion_pair = #{byGenePairTxt}
AND (H_locus LIKE CONCAT(#{byChrLocusTxt}, '%') OR T_locus LIKE CONCAT(#{byChrLocusTxt}, '%'))
AND Disease LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{byDiseaseTxt}), '%')
AND Cancertype IN
#{cancer}
OR (Source = 'FusionScan' AND Seed_reads_num >= ${noOfSeedReads})
OR (Source = 'TopHat-Fusion' AND Spanning_pairs_num >= ${noOfSpaningPairs})
OR (Source = 'PRADA' AND Junction_reads_num >= ${noOfJunctionReads})
OR (Source = 'ChiTaRs')
OR (Source = 'ChimerDB2_SRA')
OR Kinase != 0
OR Oncogene != 0
OR Tumor_suppressor != 0
OR Receptor != 0
OR Transcription_Factor != 0
AND Chr_info IN ('Intra-chr', 'Inter-chr')
AND Chr_info = 'Inter-chr'
AND Chr_info = 'Intra-chr'
AND ChimerKB != 0 OR ChimerPub != 0
AND ChimerKB != 0 AND ChimerPub != 0
AND MATCH(b.all_columns) AGAINST(#{searchKeyword} IN BOOLEAN MODE)

SELECT a.tax_id ,a.gene_id ,a.symbol ,a.locus_tag ,a.synonyms ,a.dbxrefs , CASE WHEN a.chromosome LIKE 'chr%' THEN a.chromosome ELSE CONCAT('chr', a.chromosome) END AS chromosome ,a.map_location ,a.description ,a.type_of_gene ,a.symbol_from_nomenclature_authority ,a.full_name_from_nomenclature_authority ,a.nomenclature_status ,a.other_designations ,a.modification_date ,b.* FROM I1_Gene_Info a LEFT JOIN I1_GRCh37_GFF b ON b.Gene_ID=a.gene_id AND b.no BETWEEN a.gff_start AND a.gff_end AND b.type IN ('gene', 'exon', 'mRNA', 'transcript') WHERE a.symbol=#{symbol} ORDER BY b.no

SELECT * FROM I1_GRCh37_GFF a, ( SELECT gene_id, gff_start, gff_end FROM I1_Gene_Info a WHERE symbol=#{symbol} ) b WHERE a.Gene_ID=b.gene_id AND a.no BETWEEN b.gff_start AND b.gff_end AND a.type IN ('gene', 'exon', 'mRNA', 'transcript') ORDER BY a.no

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS elementIndex , a.* FROM ( SELECT a.* FROM I1_GRCh37_GFF a, ( SELECT max(no) no FROM I1_Gene_Info a LEFT JOIN I1_GRCh37_GFF b ON b.Gene_ID=a.gene_id AND b.no BETWEEN a.gff_start AND a.gff_end AND b.type IN ('exon') WHERE a.symbol=#{symbol} GROUP BY start, end ) b WHERE a.no=b.no ) a, (SELECT @rownum:=0) b
SELECT DISTINCT CancerType FROM ChimerSeq_ver7 ORDER BY CancerType

SELECT Fusion_pair AS fusion_pair , 5Gene_Junction AS gene5Junc , 3Gene_Junction AS gene3Junc , Breakpoint_Type AS breakpoint_type , Cancertype AS cancertype, BarcodeID AS barcodeID , IF(Frame = "NA","",Frame) AS frame , Chr_info AS chr_info , Source AS source, ChimerKB AS chimerKB, ChimerPub AS chimerPub, CONCAT(ChimerKB, "_", ChimerPub) AS supported , id , ChimerDB_Type AS chimerDB_Type , webSource AS webSource , H_gene AS h_gene , H_chr AS h_chr , H_position AS h_position , H_strand AS h_strand , T_gene AS t_gene , T_position AS t_position , T_chr AS t_chr , T_strand AS t_strand , Genomic_breakpoint AS genomic_breakpoint , Exon_breakpoint AS exon_breakpoint , Genome_Build_Version AS genome_Build_Version , H_transcript AS h_transcript , H_exon AS h_exon , T_transcript AS t_transcript , T_exon AS t_exon , Seed_reads_num AS seed_reads_num , Spanning_pairs_num AS spanning_pairs_num , Junction_reads_num AS junction_reads_num , H_locus AS h_locus , T_locus AS t_locus , Kinase AS kinase , Tumor_suppressor AS tumor_suppressor , Receptor AS receptor , Transcription_Factor AS transcription_Factor FROM ChimerDB3.ChimerSeq_ver7 WHERE id=${id}

SELECT a.* FROM ChimerSeq_Pfam a, ( SELECT a.id FROM ( SELECT a.id , (greatest(chromEnd, ${geneEnd}) - least(chromStart, ${geneStart}) +1) AS val_a , ((chromEnd-chromStart+1) + (${geneEnd}-${geneStart}+1)) AS val_b FROM ChimerSeq_Pfam a, ChimerSeq_Pfam_Chr b WHERE a.id BETWEEN b.start_id AND b.end_id AND b.chromosome=#{chromosome} ) a WHERE val_a < val_b ) b WHERE a.id=b.id
